Draft Rating:

F

Bernie Bickerstaff ranks in the 7th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Bickerstaff's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 16 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Robert Werdann with 46th pick but was worth 21th pick.
  • Drafted Dikembe Mutombo with 4th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Bernard Robinson with 45th pick but was worth 27th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Emeka Okafor with 2th pick but was worth 39th pick.
  • Drafted Adam Morrison with 3th pick but was worth 47th pick.
  • Drafted Raymond Felton with 5th pick but was worth 46th pick.

Trade Rating:

D

Bernie Bickerstaff ranks in the 27th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Jared Dudley to CHA.
  • Lost Sasha Pavlović to CLE.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Jeff McInnis to CHA.
  • Lost Bernard Robinson to NJN.

Signing Rating:

C-

Bernie Bickerstaff ranks in the 41th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Reggie Williams in 1991.
  • Signed Brevin Knight in 2004.
  • Signed Jason Hart in 2004.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Tom Hammonds in 1993.
  • Signed Joe Wolf in 1990.
  • Signed Matt Carroll in 2005.
